example_answers: It's difficult or impossible to detect by ___.
concept.initial_blurb: Think about your Mythos. In the legend, did your Mythos operate secretly or deceptively? Was she able to move and act undetected? Did she use her powers to undermine authority or erode stability of either people or organizations? How so?
concept.question: How does your Mythos hide its activity in the world?

improvements.description: When you Sneak Around with power tags from this theme, it's Dynamite!
improvements.name: Cloak & Dagger

improvements.description: When you Sneak Around with power tags from this theme, on a 10+, you can use your powers to hide or mask the actions of another character in the scene.
improvements.name: Under The Wings Of Darkness

improvements.description: When you Sneak Around with power tags from this theme and get a hit, you also get 1 Clue. When you Investigate with power tags from this theme, on 7-9, the MC or the target player cannot choose to ask you a question back.
improvements.name: Stalker

improvements.description: Choose one existing NPC or PC. When you Convince them or Sneak Around them using tags from this theme, it's Dynamite! If that character dies or leaves the story, you can choose a new target.
improvements.name: Oblivious

improvements.description: You have a knack for catching people off guard. If your powers can reasonably affect your target, you always have the clear shot or opening required to make a Hit With All You've Got move (you don't need to make another move to get it).
improvements.name: Go for the Jugular

example_answers: (Puss in Boots) "Just how rich can I make my client?"
(The Devil's advocate) "Can I ever find redemption?"
prompts: Seeking clarity about what is real and what is illusory
Searching for new ways to subversively advance your Mythos' agenda
Moral doubts about using your powers to deceive others

example_answers: miraculously sneak in and out of anywhere
A.question: What is the principle ability you use to mask or hide your actions?

B.question: How do you use your powers to distract others?

C.question: What useful quality does your main effect have?

example_answers: sway them to shower me with gifts
smite with the strength of twelve men
D.question: What do you do best under the cover of secrecy?

example_answers: the king will never catch me
just an unpretentious Joe or Jane
E.question: Who is most likely to fall prey to your subversive activity?

example_answers: intuit every detail of one's wealth
F.question: How does operating secretly allow you to learn new information?

example_answers: the pizza parlor owner's youngest son
G.question: Who are you in league with?

example_answers: laws of Man don't apply to me
"Oh pleaseâ¦ you don't expect me to fall for that?"
H.question: What is unlikely to affect you thanks to your powers?

example_answers: harder to see in the dark
I.question: What circumstances or conditions improve your ability to act undetected?

example_answers: control the wearer of the boots
J.question: What other tangential subversive power have you developed?

example_answers: One of them saw something that incriminated you or revealed what you truly are. What was it and under what circumstances? If you have since made them your confidant, take a Help point on them. Otherwise, take a Hurt point on them.

You share a secret with one of them, something that the other crew members don't know. Take a Help point on them, but if this crewmate ever blows the lid on your secret, take a Hurt point on them too.
One of them makes you feel exposed. You find their powers, abilities, or personality invasive. Take a Hurt point on them.
elaborate trickery is easier to expose
revealed by the holy light of heaven
A.question: What could expose you?

example_answers: the shameful deeds of the past
victims always have hope for redemption
B.question: What is revealed when you are exposed?

example_answers: the pizza parlor owner's youngest son
C.question: Who or what are you hiding from?

example_answers: must tease and taunt my victims
D.question: What disadvantageous psychological tendencies have you developed in the shadows or behind your mask?
